name: Elevate Foods
description: Elevate Foods is your go-to source for high-quality, sustainably sourced processed food products at a cost-effective price. By sourcing directly from farm-gate processors, we ensure traceability, sustainability, and economical pricing. Our specialised offerings bring to you farm-sourced products ranging from geotagged processed fruits and vegetables (eg. banana flour or jackfruit / mushroom powder) to indigenous spices (think 7%+ curcumin level turmeric, or the freshest diamond quality black pepper amongst several others).
mission: We're more than just a supplier â€“ we're your partner in sustainability and success. Together, we're revolutionizing the food industry, driving positive change, and building a better future for all.
specialties: Geotagged processed fruits and vegetables (banana flour, jackfruit powder, mushroom powder)
